description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored 'Across Space And Time,' exploring 'ecosystem architecture' and its applications beyond the biological sense.
blurb: The term 'ecosystem' has evolved beyond biology to describe dynamic, non-bounded human organizations, transcending space and time. Introduction to 'ecosystem architecture,' a multidisciplinary practice.
